anathema: Destroy wards that are actively protecting innocents, refuse to use your magic to help those in need who ask you
edict: Use magic to defend yourself and your allies, maintain magical wards, seek greater magical knowledge
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Friends in High Places](/Sources.aspx?ID=30) pg. 1

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** Use magic to defend yourself and your allies, maintain magical wards, seek greater magical knowledge

**Anathema** Destroy wards that are actively protecting innocents, refuse to use your magic to help those in need who ask you

**Area of Concern**
Abjuration magic, protection, self-improvement

**Follower Alignments**
LN, NG, N, CG

**Pantheon Members**
[Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=288), [Thoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=61)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **4th**
[Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255)

- **9th**
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77)

</column>
name: Wards of the Pharaoh
